qos module¶

This module is part of the nmeta suite running on top of Ryu SDN controller to provide Quality of Service (QoS) determinations based on Traffic Classification (TC) metadata

class qos.QoS(_config)¶

Bases: object

This class is instantiated by flow.py and provides methods to add evaluate flow metadata, DPIDs and forwarding decisions and generate a QoS treatment action (i.e. set output queue). It also ingests a YAML-format QoS configuration file that contains the QoS treatment policy, and uses this to determine appropriate treatment action(s)

check_policy(flow_actions)¶

Passed a set of Flow Actions. Check if against QoS policy rules return any treatment action

validate_policy()¶

Check Quality of Service (QoS) policy to ensure that it is in correct format so that it won’t cause unexpected errors during packet checks.
